礩字的基本解释

礩
zhì
柱子下边的石礅子。
古通“窒”，堵塞：“有宿疑礩滞者数十条，皆莫能详辨。”

礩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》之日切，入質，章。］
［《廣韻》脂利切，去至，章。］
(1)柱下石础。
(2)用同“窒”。参见“礩滯”。

礩字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　礩； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页838第22
【唐韻】之日切【集韻】【正韻】職日切，?音質。【說文】柱下石。　又【集韻】脂利切，音至。義同。　又【字彙補】同窒。【周書熊安生傳】宿疑礩滯。

礩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
礩字的起名意思

柱子下边的石礅子。

礩
Basic explanation of words
礩
zhì
The stone mound under the pillar.
Gu Tong "suffocated" and blocked: "There are dozens of suspected and stagnant people, and none of them can be distinguished in detail."
礩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
[The date of "Guangyun" is cut, into the quality, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" Zhi Liqie, Go to, Chapter. ]
(1) The stone foundation under the pillar.
(2) Use the same as "suffocation". See "Stagnation".
礩
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　礩; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 838 22
[Tang Yun] Daily Cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Daily Cut,? Sound quality. [Said the text] under the stone.　[Jiyun] Zhiliqie, the sound is perfect. The same meaning.　[Word Supplement] Same as suffocation. [Zhou Shu Xiong Ansheng Biography] Suspicious and stagnant.
